messages.subject: Julie's BHAG'S
messages.msgSnippet: These are some really good ideas!!  Thanks for sharing.  I am going to do the BHAG with my dd tomorrow.  I love these out-of-the-box ideas because it is great
messages.messageBody:
"These are some really good ideas!! Thanks for sharing. I am going to do
the BHAG with my dd tomorrow. I love these out-of-the-box ideas because it
is great to use non-schoolish solutions to "schoolish desires."
Besides, I
wonder what kind of BHAGs I can come up with for myself. <g>
Lisa (in IL)"

Thank Julie, not me!!:)
I've always loved writing down goals and interests, but the BHAG thing hit a note with me and helped us verbalize our wildest desires in a new way. So thanks for a great article Julie...I couldn't remember for the life of me which HEM that was or who had written it.

Ren
